alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 01 at 3:47AM CST until January 03 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees possible. * WHERE...Inland Kenedy County. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
